title: Patch Not Working
body:
The client keeps telling me to restart my client because, "Patching failed and we're not sure why. Please restart the client to try patching again. (Error code 004)"

However, this is the 3rd time I've restarted the client, and I just don't know anymore.

replies.body: This error code is the updated client indicated a possible network issue reaching the patching server, so it can't download any updates.  Go over the steps of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot and strengthen your connection.  Let me know if you have any questions!
